special-armor.itemDescription:: A jet-black set of jagged armor, it imbues the wearer with incredible strength. This strength comes with a price, eating away the wearer's soul bite by bloody bite.
A brilliant gold and blue armor, adorned with scriptures of protection, granting the wearer a tremendous speed to outmaneuver most adversaries.

A set of hardened leather armor made from the carcass of a slain wolf-beast. It shines eerily in the dark, as a red oil seeps out of the joints over the leather plates, as though it continues to bleed.
Appearing as a common set of fencing armor, the wearer can feel a cold aura from the aged cloth and metallic mask. Upon donning the mask, one cannot help but feel ghostly tears shed from their eyes.
A comfortable set of golden shorts, the fabric stretching just to your size. Their metallic shimmer catches the attention of any enemy trying to fight you for the Belt.
